metadata.title: USN-6008-1 -- Exo vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Exo did not properly sanitized desktop files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to to cause a crash or arbitrary code execution.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6008-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libexo-common - 4.16.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libexo-2-0 - 4.16.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libexo-2-dev - 4.16.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 exo-utils - 4.16.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
